name: Periculum Services Group
overview: Periculum Services Group provides certificate tracking and monitoring solutions in the United States. The company offers Periculum Lite, a solution for clients, which provides a repository of insurance certificate information and robust reporting capabilities to work with their vendors on insurance matters. It also provides comprehensive tracking services, and consulting and training services, as well as engages in obtaining, validating, and monitoring insurance certificates. In addition, the company implements solutions that provide XML and Web service capabilities and access to data from wireless devices using mobile Web technology. Further, it identifies potential business partner risk exposure; proactive management of vendors; and tracks other related vendor documentation. Furthermore, the company tracks the certificates for landlords, motor carriers, product vendors, tenants, suppliers, franchisees, borrowers, maintenance contractors, vendors, and professional services. It serves risk managers in property management, shipping and transportation, manufacturing, distribution, retail, government, petroleum, educational institutions, construction, aviation, banking, chemical, food service, medical supply, property management, and restaurant industries. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Portland, Michigan. As of April 25, 2008, Periculum Services Group operates as a subsidiary of Ebix, Inc.
